overview: Rose Manning swears revenge for the unjust slaying of her father by Inspector McArthur. Five years later, as a nightclub hostess, she is sought by Chuck Gaines, secretly a bootlegger, but she centers her attentions on young Jimmy Carter, who, she learns, is the son of McArthur.
tagline: Spiking the death-flashing Gats of Gangland in its Reign of Terror....Dramatic Triumph of the Law, Over the Lawless!
title: Framed
